item.description:
We're co-sponsoring an event with The Executives Club of Boston.

Time: 8:05 - 9 am

WHY YOU SHOULD JOIN US
This is a wonderful way for folks to get together OVER THE PHONE...

- to get great ideas from Steve Gamlin re: " Attitude, Action & The Law of Attraction - How To Stay Motivated During Tough Times"

and (here's the WOW BONUS)

- to develop potential collaborations and find new clients/jobs through this "green" ONLINE & PHONE networking "blitz" ( you get to have 1-on-1 conversations with 5 - 6 different folks in less than an hour from wherever you are -- save time, money & gas)

and, yes, it's currently FREE to join this event.

HOW TO GET THE MOST BENEFIT OF THE LOA-BLITZ EXPERIENCE:

(1) Sign up today to give yourself time to set up your profile online. This helps folks you're networking with to know about you, your job and/or business. Note: You can always add/edit your profile info in the future too.

(2) Register for the LOA-Blitz event (see the link below).

(3) On Friday at 8 am, sign onto the website and dial into the phone line.
Note: If you can't be in front of the computer, just make sure you have the phone number with you.

(4) Brent Trethewey, the event "host" of Executives Club of Boston. explains how the LOA-Blitz works and what to expect.

(5) Steven Gamlin, the presenter, shares great ideas re: " Attitude, Action & The Law of Attraction - How To Stay Motivated During Tough Times".

(6) Then the fun begins ;o). The BlitzTime system automatically sets you up with 1-on-1 conversations of 6 minutes in length. During this time, you find out more about the person on the other end of the phone and tell him/her about yourself.

(7) We all come back together again at the end for a final wrap-up. The Blitz session is one hour.

Go here for details of the LOA-Blitz event and to SIGN UP!
http://www.blitztime....

VERY IMPORTANT!
After you RSVP for the event here, you MUST register for the event ON BLITZTIME or you will NOT get into the event. http://www.blitztime....

************************************************
How ChewHoong "attracted" this effortless, fun way of networking:

I've being using this amazing "networking" platform the past few months & it's a blast. I actually "manifested" this venue because I was looking for alternative easy, convenient and cheap ways to network (not just locally but nationwide) besides attending In-Person networking events.

So, guess what dropped into my lap. A company with a new technology that's making it easy and effortless for folks to have 1-on-1 conversations over the phone. Cool, huh?
(Even cooler is that it was a Boston LOA member, Deb Mullen, who mentioned BlitzTime to me.
Extra WOW is to find out that one of the inspired creators of BlitzTime, Mike Sachleben, is a BostonLOA member.)

and yes, I've met a lot of wonderful folks nationwide that I'm collaborating with (for various business-related and social activities).

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Special Event: LOA-BLITZ with Easy, Effortless Way of Networking
